ooC: Repost (sorta).

--Scryed--

The pod that Hot Rod had carried to the Maximal base, buzzed for a 
second or two, and it's status lights blinked several times, before 
returning to steady full power. The release clasps click open, and 
the stasis pod's door begins to open with a hissing noise. 
Unfortunately, the door hits an obstuction, and needs to be 
repostitioned before the bot inside may exit.
